lieutenant_on_bike.name: Lieutenant on Bike
lieutenant_on_bike.description: A fearless leader on combat bike.

captain_on_bike.name: Captain on Bike
captain_on_bike.description: A fearless leader on combat bike.

psychic_on_bike.name: Psychic on Bike
psychic_on_bike.description: A fearless psychic on combat bike.

engineer_on_bike.name: Engineer on Bike
engineer_on_bike.description: A fearless marine engineer on combat bike.

zealot.name: Zealot
zealot.description: An armored priest who blesses their allies and smites their foes.

zealot_on_bike.name: Zealot on Bike
zealot_on_bike.description: An armored priest on a combat bike who blesses their allies and smites their foes.

surgeon.name: Surgeon
surgeon.description: A fearless battlefield medic trained in saving lives.

surgeon_on_bike.name: Surgeon on Bike
surgeon_on_bike.description: A fearless battlefield medic on combat bike trained in saving lives.

imperial_marine.name: Imperial Marine
imperial_marine.description: An elite trained marine sworn to protect the Empire.

imperial_marine_sergeant.name: Marine Sergeant
imperial_marine_sergeant.description: An elite trained marine leader sworn to protect the Empire.

assault_marine.name: Assault Marine
assault_marine.description: An elite marine equipped with a jetpack trained to fight in close combat.

assault_marine_sergeant.name: Assault Marine Sergeant
assault_marine_sergeant.description: An elite marine leader equipped with a jetpack trained to fight in close combat.

scout_marine.name: Scout Marine
scout_marine.description: An elite trained marine specialized in infiltration and stealth tactics.

scout_marine_sergeant.name: Scout Marine Sergeant
scout_marine_sergeant.description: An elite trained marine leader specialized in infiltration and stealth tactics.

scout_marine_heavy.name: Scout Marine Heavy
scout_marine_heavy.description: An elite trained marine gunner specialized in infiltration and stealth tactics.

strike_marine.name: Strike Marine
strike_marine.description: An elite, well-equipped marine grouped up into deadly strike teams.

strike_marine_sergeant.name: Strike Marine Sergeant
strike_marine_sergeant.description: An elite, well-equipped marine leading a deadly strike team.

strike_marine_heavy.name: Strike Marine Heavy
strike_marine_heavy.description: An elite, well-equipped marine gunner grouped up into deadly strike teams.

hazard_marine.name: Hazard Marine
hazard_marine.description: An elite, well-equipped marine specialising in chemical and radiological weaponry.

hazard_marine_sergeant.name: Hazard Marine Sergeant
hazard_marine_sergeant.description: An elite, well-equipped marine leader specialising in chemical and radiological weaponry.

marine_biker.name: Marine Biker
marine_biker.description: Upgraded and highly trained biker armed to the teeth.

marine_biker_sergeant.name: Marine Biker Sergeant
marine_biker_sergeant.description: Upgraded and highly trained biker leader armed to the teeth.

scout_biker.name: Scout Biker
scout_biker.description: Scout marine on a combat bike.

scout_biker_sergeant.name: Scout Biker Sergeant
scout_biker_sergeant.description: Scout marine leader on a combat bike.

furious_assault_marine_sergeant.name: Furious Marine Sergeant
furious_assault_marine_sergeant.description: An especially angry assault marine leader.

destroyer.name: Destroyer
destroyer.description: Highly trained marine clad in very heavy armor.

destroyer_sergeant.name: Destroyer Sergeant
destroyer_sergeant.description: Highly trained marine clad in very heavy armor.

devastator.name: Devastator
devastator.description: A highly trained marine armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

devastator_sergeant.name: Devastator Sergeant
devastator_sergeant.description: A highly trained marine leader armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

heavy_devastator.name: Heavy Devastator
heavy_devastator.description: A highly trained marine armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

heavy_devastator_sergeant.name: Heavy Devastator Sergeant
heavy_devastator_sergeant.description: A squad of highly trained marines armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

psychic_grand_master.name: Psychic Grand Master
psychic_grand_master.description: A Master of psychic powers and martial combat, wielding heavy destroyer armor.

psychic_marine.name: Psychic Marine
psychic_marine.description: A marine trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_marine_sergeant.name: Psychic Marine Sergeant
psychic_marine_sergeant.description: A marine leader trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

purge_marine.name: Purge Marine
purge_marine.description: A marine trained to hunt demons with heavy psychic weapons.

teleport_marine.name: Teleport Marine
teleport_marine.description: A marine trained to hunt demons with a teleporting backpack.

psychic_destroyer.name: Psychic Destroyer
psychic_destroyer.description: A marine in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_destroyer_sergeant.name: Psychic Destroyer Sergeant
psychic_destroyer_sergeant.description: A marine leader in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_paladin.name: Psychic Paladin
psychic_paladin.description: A tough marine in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_paladin_sergeant.name: Psychic Paladin Sergeant
psychic_paladin_sergeant.description: A tough marine leader in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_biker.name: Psychic Biker
psychic_biker.description: A marine trained to hunt demons on a combat bike.

psychic_biker_sergeant.name: Psychic Biker Sergeant
psychic_biker_sergeant.description: A marine leader trained to hunt demons on a combat bike.

multi_scanner.name: Multi-Scanner
multi_scanner.description: Once per round, this unit may re-roll an Initiative test.

legend_master_duelist.name: Master Duelist
legend_master_duelist.description: This model gains +1 Strength when fighting enemy _Leader_ models.

legend_drill_sergeant.name: Drill Sergeant
legend_drill_sergeant.description: Friendly _Infantry_ models within 6" add +3" to the short and long range of their weapons.

hidden_relics.flavor: Ancient armour said to protect the wearer from significant harm.
A chainsword crafted to destroy even the toughest enemy infantry.
A trained marksman can have a very deadly effect.
A well-trained tactician in mobility warfare.
A trained fighter can dispatch even the toughest foes in deadly combat.

legend_master_duelist.name: Master Duelist
legend_master_duelist.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Master Duelist.
legend_master_duelist.flavor: This master of the blade has struck down countless foes, earning them this grim title.

legend_energy_shield.name: Personal Shield Generator
legend_energy_shield.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ or _Support_ model with Tough(1).
legend_energy_shield.flavor: This shield generator can be overcharged to bounce back even the toughest attacks for a moment.

legend_drill_sergeant.name: Drill Sergeant
legend_drill_sergeant.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Drill Sergeant.
legend_drill_sergeant.flavor: Through years of hard training and bellowing commands the effective range of infantry can be pushed past the limit.

strategies.name: Vigilance
strategies.description: Use when taking an Initiative test for a reaction. That unit is treated as having +2 Initiative for that test.
strategies.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these soldiers are trained to react to any situation.

strategies.name: Genetically Engineered
strategies.description: Use before taking Save rolls for an _Infantry_ or _Biker_ unit. It gets +1 Save.
strategies.flavor: With the best implants and engineering that can be found, it's easy to take a hit and keep standing.

strategies.name: Fearless
strategies.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
strategies.flavor: Marines are trained to stay strong even in the toughest fights.

blink.name: Blink
blink.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may move up to 12" ignoring all models and terrain. This must end outside of 12" of any enemy units.

banishment.name: Banishment
banishment.description: Target enemy model within 12" takes 1 automatic hit with AP(7).

purge.name: Purge
purge.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 8 automatic hits with AP 0.

empower.name: Empower
empower.description: Target friendly unit within 12 gains +1 Strength and +1 Accuracy until the end of the turn.

snare.name: Snare
snare.description: Target enemy unit within 18" has -2" Movement until the end of the turn.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: Target friendly unit within 24. Until the end of the round, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 2 or less, that hit is ignored.
